jobposts.orgName: Công ty lập trình phần mềm FPT Software
jobposts.professionalSkills:
Proficiency in a backend programming language: Javascript, Typescript, or Python.
Basic knowledge of frameworks: Spring Boot, Hibernate, ExpressJS,...
Familiarity with SQL databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Redis).
Skills in building and securing APIs (RESTful APIs, JWT, OAuth).
Basic knowledge of version control tools: Git.
Strong teamwork and problem-solving skills.
jobposts.jobBenefit:
- Competitive monthly allowance for interns.
- Opportunity to work on real-world projects and enhance technical skills.
- Access to training programs and mentoring by experienced developers.
- Networking opportunities with professionals in the field.
- Free snacks, coffee, and access to an engaging work environment.
- Certificate of completion and recommendation letter upon successful internship.
- Possibility of full-time employment based on performance.
jobposts.leavePolicy: Flexible working hours for interns to balance work and study. One day of paid leave per month during the internship period. Additional leave for medical or personal emergencies with prior approval. National holidays observed as per company policy.
jobposts.jobDescription:
- Assist in developing backend features for the enterprise data management system.
- Participate in building and optimizing RESTful APIs using Spring Boot.
- Work with MySQL and MongoDB databases, including table design and query optimization.
- Learn and apply containerization technologies such as Docker.
- Contribute to writing technical documentation and progress reports for the management team.
- Support in testing, debugging, and improving developed modules.
jobposts.workEnvironment: Collaborative and supportive team culture where interns are encouraged to contribute ideas and solutions. A modern, comfortable office with access to the latest development tools and technologies. A flexible work schedule, with options for remote work when necessary. Regular team-building activities and social events to foster a positive work atmosphere. Open-door policy with managers and mentors for continuous learning and feedback. Opportunities for professional growth through training and hands-on experience. A diverse, inclusive workplace that values different perspectives and backgrounds.

jobposts.location: Tầng 19, Tòa nhà AP Tower, 518B Điện Biên Phủ, Phường 21, Quận Bình Thạnh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
jobposts.professionalSkills: Thành thạo Unity, C#, Python, C++
jobposts.jobBenefit:
Chế độ đãi ngộ
1. Lương và giờ làm việc

Lương: Hấp dẫn
Vị trí này sẽ làm việc tại văn phòng. Thời gian làm việc từ 9:00 - 18:30, từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6.
2. Bảo hiểm và chế độ thưởng

Được tham gia đầy đủ BHXH/ BHYT/ BHTN theo quy định của luật lao động.
Ngoài ra bạn sẽ được tham gia bảo hiểm sức khỏe riêng PVI.
Phụ cấp ăn trưa hàng tháng.
Thưởng cố định lương tháng 13.
Thưởng cuối năm không giới hạn, tùy thuộc vào doanh thu của công ty và mức độ đóng góp của bạn trong các dự án.
3. Cân bằng cuộc sống & công việc

Ngoài những ngày nghỉ lễ theo quy định của nhà nước, chúng tôi có thêm rất nhiều ngày nghỉ được trả lương và nghỉ ốm.
4. Nơi làm việc thoải mái

Tại văn phòng, chúng tôi có khu vực giải trí, cung cấp đồ ăn phụ và đồ uống miễn phí để giúp bạn làm việc thoải mái và cân bằng.
Góc Thư viện sách cho các bạn thích đọc sách giấy.
5. Phát triển chuyên môn và giáo dục

Chúng tôi hoàn trả chi phí cho việc tham gia vào các hội nghị và khóa học có liên quan, đồng thời thường xuyên tổ chức các chương trình đào tạo nâng cao nghiệp vụ.
Công ty có chính sách hỗ trợ việc thăng tiến và phát triển sự nghiệp của nhân viên.
6. Giải trí và gắn kết

Hàng tuần / tháng / năm, chúng tôi tổ chức nhiều sự kiện, bao gồm các cuộc thi, thử thách thể thao, tiệc, happy hours, team building, hackathons và sự kiện ngoại tuyến dành cho từng đội.
7. Dự án trách nhiệm xã hội

Chúng tôi tiếp tục triển khai các dự án từ thiện và hỗ trợ ý tưởng của nhân viên trong các cuộc thi tài trợ.

recruiters.orgName: Công ty lập trình phần mềm FPT Software
recruiters.orgBenefits: FPT Software là công ty thành viên thuộc Tập đoàn FPT. Được thành lập từ năm 1999, FPT Software hiện là công ty chuyên cung cấp các dịch vụ và giải pháp phần mềm cho các khách hàng quốc tế, với hơn 28000 nhân viên, hiện diện tại 27 quốc gia trên toàn cầu. Nhiều năm liền, FPT Software được bình chọn là Nhà Tuyển dụng được yêu thích nhất và nằm trong TOP các công ty có môi trường làm việc tốt nhất châu Á.
recruiters.orgIntroduction: FPT Software là công ty thành viên thuộc Tập đoàn FPT. Được thành lập từ năm 1999,

recruiters.orgAddress: 123 Lê Hữu Trác, Sơn Trà, Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam

recruiters.orgName: Công ty Công nghệ thông tin CMC
recruiters.orgAddress: Tòa nhà CMC Tower, số 11 phố Duy Tân, Phường Dịch Vọng Hậu, Quận Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội.
Tầng 19, Tòa nhà AP Tower, 518B Điện Biên Phủ, Phường 21, Quận Bình Thạnh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
recruiters.orgBenefits:
Benefits

1. Salary and working hours

Salary: Attractive
This position will work in the office. Working hours are from 9:00 - 18:30, from Monday to Friday.

2. Insurance and bonus

Full participation in social insurance/health insurance/unemployment insurance according to the provisions of the labor law.
In addition, you will participate in PVI's own health insurance.
Monthly lunch allowance.
Fixed bonus of 13th month salary.
Unlimited year-end bonus, depending on the company's revenue and your contribution to the projects.

3. Work & life balance

In addition to public holidays, we have many paid holidays and sick leave.

4. Comfortable workplace

In the office, we have an entertainment area, providing free snacks and drinks to help you work comfortably and in balance.
Book Library Corner for those who like to read paper books.
5. Professional Development and Education

We reimburse the cost of participating in relevant conferences and courses, and regularly organize professional development training programs.
The company has a policy of supporting employees' promotion and career development.
6. Entertainment and Engagement

We organize a variety of events every week/month/year, including competitions, sports challenges, parties, happy hours, team building, hackathons and offline events for each team.
7. Social Responsibility Projects

We continue to implement charity projects and support employee ideas in sponsorship competitions.
recruiters.orgIntroduction:
About Us
Founded in 2018, Sun Studio is a web and mobile game developer with over 1 billion plays. Our mission is to create games that are accessible and enjoyable for everyone.

Currently, the company has nearly 60 members, dozens of collaborators with over 40 game titles and is a strategic partner of the world's leading web-games platforms such as: Facebook Instant Games, Yandex, Game Distribution, Glance Gaming....

projects.projectDescription: Web application to sell rice online

candidates.personalDescription: I love playing sport and listening to music
candidates.professionalSkills:
FRONT-END
HTML-CSS(SCSS), Javascript, ReactJS, TaiwindCSS
WORKING SKILL
Understanding about GIT (Github), Figma, Postman

projects.projectDescription:
Dashboard integrate two given database
An Application that shows the following summarized information
The total earnings by shareholder, gender, ethnicity, part-time, and full- time employee to date and the previous year, by department
Total number of vacation days taken by shareholder, gender, ethnicity, part-time, and fulltime employee to date and the previous year
Average benefits paid to shareholders and non-shareholders to date by benefits plan
In addition, management would like to be able to set alerts when the following conditions occur:
An employee is within a certain number of days of their hiring anniversary
An employee has accumulated more than a certain number of days of vacation
Employees make a change to their benefits plan that affects their payroll
All employees who have birthdays within the current month

This is a team project to end our course. It's a project that applies some quality attributes such as Security(refreshToken, revokeToken), Scalability(Micro-service), Availability(rate-limit), Performance(server caching).

experiences.previousJobDetails:
- Participated in developing backend modules for the internal data management system.
- Learned and worked with Spring Boot to build RESTful APIs.
- Integrated MySQL database into applications, optimized queries, and designed table structures.
- Assisted in deploying applications to servers using Docker and Jenkins.
- Wrote and executed unit tests to ensure code quality.
- Attended team meetings, received feedback, and improved coding skills.
- Learned and applied security principles in backend application development.

certifications.certificateDetail:
Developing and deploying applications on the AWS platform.
Deep understanding of core AWS services such as Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, API Gateway, ECS, and more.
Proficient use of AWS CLI and SDK tools for integration and application development.
Optimizing application performance and cost on AWS.
Securing applications through IAM, data encryption, and access control policies.

candidates.address: 318 Ton Dan St. An Khe, Thanh Khe, Da Nang, VN
candidates.personalDescription:
As a fourth-year student with a 3.4 GPA, I seek employment as a Backend NodeJS Developer. In second-
year, I successfully developed an e-commerce website using .NET technology. Currently, I am collaborating

with a team to refine an application capable of seamlessly integrating disparate systems, further enhancing my
proficiency in Back-end development and teamwork. I hope to build on my previous experience and make a
meaningful contribution to the organization I am working for.
candidates.professionalSkills:
I am proficient in some skills below:
- Programming languages: Javascript, Typescript, Python
- Database: 
MongoDB, MySQL, SQL Server
- RESTful API
- Tools: git/Github, Docker, Postman
- IDE: VS Code, PyCharm, IntellliJ

- Framework: Vue, React, Angular
- Programming languages: Javascript
- Database: MongoDB, MySQL, 
- RESTful API
- Tools: git/Github, Docker

- 2 năm C#
- 1 năm Unity
- 4 năm C++

The total earnings by shareholder, gender, ethnicity, part-time, and full- time employee to date and the previous year, by department
Total number of vacation days taken by shareholder, gender, ethnicity, part-time, and fulltime employee to date and the previous year
Average benefits paid to shareholders and non-shareholders to date by benefits plan
In addition, management would like to be able to set alerts when the following conditions occur:
An employee is within a certain number of days of their hiring anniversary
An employee has accumulated more than a certain number of days of vacation
Employees make a change to their benefits plan that affects their payroll
All employees who have birthdays within the current month

This is a team project to end our course. It's a project that applies some quality attributes such as Security(refreshToken, revokeToken), Scalability(Micro-service), Availability(rate-limit), Performance(server caching).
